00025 #define min(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
00026 #define max(a,b) (a<b?b:a)

00033 complex double sopt_utility_softthc(complex double x, double T){
00034   
00035   complex double sgn;
00036   complex double xout;
00037   double norm;
00038   
00039   norm = cabs(x);
00040   if (norm == 0)
00041     sgn = 0;
00042   else 
00043     sgn = x/norm;
00044   norm = max(0,norm-T);
00045   xout = sgn*norm;
00046   return xout;
00047 }
00048 
00054 double sopt_utility_softthr(double x, double T){
00055   
00056   double sgn;
00057   double xout;
00058   double norm;
00059   
00060   norm = fabs(x);
00061   if (norm == 0)
00062     sgn = 0;
00063   else 
00064     sgn = x/norm;
00065   norm = max(0,norm-T);
00066   xout = sgn*norm;
00067   return xout;
00068 }

00076 double sopt_utility_l1normc(complex double *x, double *w, int dim){
00077   
00078   int i;
00079   double norm;
00080   
00081   norm = 0;
00082   
00083   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00084     norm += w[i]*cabs(x[i]);
00085   }
00086   
00087   return norm;
00088   
00089 }

00103   
00104   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {

00118 double sopt_utility_sql2normc(complex double *x, double *w, int dim){
00119   
00120   int i;
00121   double norm;
00122   
00123   norm = 0;
00124   
00125   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00126     norm += w[i]*w[i]*(creal(x[i])*creal(x[i]) + cimag(x[i])*cimag(x[i]));
00127   }
00128   
00129   return norm;
00130   
00131 }
00132 
00139 double sopt_utility_sql2normr(double *x, double *w, int dim){
00140   
00141   int i;
00142   double norm;
00143   
00144   norm = 0;
00145   
00146   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00147     norm += w[i]*w[i]*x[i]*x[i];
00148   }
00149   
00150   return norm;
00151   
00152 }

00160 double sopt_utility_tvnormc(complex double *x, int dim1, int dim2){
00161   
00162   int i;
00163   double norm, temp;
00164   complex double *dx, *dy;
00165   
00166   dx = (complex double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(complex double));
00167   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00168   dy = (complex double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(complex double));
00169   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00170   
00171   sopt_utility_gradientc(dx, dy, x, dim1, dim2);
00172   
00173   norm = 0;
00174   
00175   for (i = 0; i < dim1*dim2; i++) {
00176     temp = creal(dx[i])*creal(dx[i]) + cimag(dx[i])*cimag(dx[i]);
00177     temp += creal(dy[i])*creal(dy[i]) + cimag(dy[i])*cimag(dy[i]);
00178     norm += sqrt(temp);
00179   }
00180   
00181   //Free temporary memory
00182   free(dx);
00183   free(dy);
00184   
00185   return norm;
00186   
00187 }
00188 
00195 double sopt_utility_tvnormr(double *x, int dim1, int dim2){
00196   
00197   int i;
00198   double norm, temp;
00199   double *dx, *dy;
00200   
00201   dx = (double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(double));
00202   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00203   dy = (double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(double));
00204   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00205   
00206   sopt_utility_gradientr(dx, dy, x, dim1, dim2);
00207   
00208   norm = 0;
00209   
00210   for (i = 0; i < dim1*dim2; i++) {
00211     temp = dx[i]*dx[i] + dy[i]*dy[i];
00212     norm += sqrt(temp);
00213   }
00214   
00215   //Free temporary memory
00216   free(dx);
00217   free(dy);
00218   
00219   return norm;
00220   
00221 }

00231 double sopt_utility_wtvnormc(complex double *x, double *wt_dx, double *wt_dy, int dim1, int dim2){
00232   
00233   int i;
00234   double norm, temp;
00235   complex double *dx, *dy;
00236   
00237   dx = (complex double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(complex double));
00238   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00239   dy = (complex double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(complex double));
00240   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00241   
00242   sopt_utility_gradientc(dx, dy, x, dim1, dim2);
00243 
00244   for (i = 0; i < dim1*dim2; i++) {
00245     dx[i] = wt_dx[i]*dx[i];
00246     dy[i] = wt_dy[i]*dy[i];
00247   }
00248   
00249   norm = 0;
00250   
00251   for (i = 0; i < dim1*dim2; i++) {
00252     temp = creal(dx[i])*creal(dx[i]) + cimag(dx[i])*cimag(dx[i]);
00253     temp += creal(dy[i])*creal(dy[i]) + cimag(dy[i])*cimag(dy[i]);
00254     norm += sqrt(temp);
00255   }
00256   
00257   //Free temporary memory
00258   free(dx);
00259   free(dy);
00260   
00261   return norm;
00262   
00263 }

00273 double sopt_utility_wtvnormr(double *x, double *wt_dx, double *wt_dy, int dim1, int dim2){
00274   
00275   int i;
00276   double norm, temp;
00277   double *dx, *dy;
00278   
00279   dx = (double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(double));
00280   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00281   dy = (double*)malloc((dim1*dim2) * sizeof(double));
00282   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00283   
00284   sopt_utility_gradientr(dx, dy, x, dim1, dim2);
00285 
00286   for (i = 0; i < dim1*dim2; i++) {
00287     dx[i] = wt_dx[i]*dx[i];
00288     dy[i] = wt_dy[i]*dy[i];
00289   }
00290   
00291   norm = 0;
00292   
00293   for (i = 0; i < dim1*dim2; i++) {
00294     temp = dx[i]*dx[i] + dy[i]*dy[i];
00295     norm += sqrt(temp);
00296   }
00297   
00298   //Free temporary memory
00299   free(dx);
00300   free(dy);
00301 
00302   return norm;
00303   
00304 }

00314 void sopt_utility_gradientc(complex double *dx, complex double *dy, 
00315                    complex double *xin, int dim1, int dim2){
00316   
00317   int i, j;
00318   
00319   for (i = 0; i < dim1-1; i++) {
00320     for (j = 0; j < dim2-1; j++) {
00321       dx[i+dim1*j] = xin[(i+1)+dim1*j]-xin[i+dim1*j];
00322       dy[i+dim1*j] = xin[i+dim1*(j+1)]-xin[i+dim1*j];
00323     }
00324   }
00325   //Last column of dx
00326   for (i = 0; i < dim1-1; i++) {
00327     dx[i+dim1*(dim2-1)] = xin[(i+1)+dim1*(dim2-1)]-xin[i+dim1*(dim2-1)];
00328   }
00329   
00330   //Last row of dx all zeros
00331   for (j = 0; j < dim2; j++) {
00332     dx[(dim1-1)+dim1*j] = 0;
00333   }
00334   
00335   //Last row of dy
00336   for (j = 0; j < dim2-1; j++) {
00337     dy[(dim1-1)+dim1*j] = xin[(dim1-1)+dim1*(j+1)]-xin[(dim1-1)+dim1*j];
00338   }
00339   
00340   //Last column of dy all zeros
00341   for (i = 0; i < dim1; i++) {
00342     dy[i+dim1*(dim2-1)] = 0;
00343   }
00344   
00345 }
00346 
00354 void sopt_utility_gradientr(double *dx, double *dy, double *xin, int dim1, int dim2){
00355   
00356   int i, j;
00357   
00358   for (i = 0; i < dim1-1; i++) {
00359     for (j = 0; j < dim2-1; j++) {
00360       dx[i+dim1*j] = xin[(i+1)+dim1*j]-xin[i+dim1*j];
00361       dy[i+dim1*j] = xin[i+dim1*(j+1)]-xin[i+dim1*j];
00362     }
00363   }
00364   //Last column of dx
00365   for (i = 0; i < dim1-1; i++) {
00366     dx[i+dim1*(dim2-1)] = xin[(i+1)+dim1*(dim2-1)]-xin[i+dim1*(dim2-1)];
00367   }
00368   
00369   //Last row of dx all zeros
00370   for (j = 0; j < dim2; j++) {
00371     dx[(dim1-1)+dim1*j] = 0;
00372   }
00373   
00374   //Last row of dy
00375   for (j = 0; j < dim2-1; j++) {
00376     dy[(dim1-1)+dim1*j] = xin[(dim1-1)+dim1*(j+1)]-xin[(dim1-1)+dim1*j];
00377   }
00378   
00379   //Last column of dy all zeros
00380   for (i = 0; i < dim1; i++) {
00381     dy[i+dim1*(dim2-1)] = 0;
00382   }
00383   
00384 }
00385 
00393 void sopt_utility_divergencec(complex double *xout, complex double *dx, 
00394                      complex double *dy, int dim1, int dim2){
00395   
00396   int i, j;
00397   
00398   for (j = 0; j < dim2; j++) {
00399     xout[dim1*j] = dx[dim1*j];
00400     for (i = 0; i < dim1-2; i++) {
00401       xout[(i+1)+dim1*j] = dx[(i+1)+dim1*j]-dx[i+dim1*j];
00402     }
00403     xout[(dim1-1)+dim1*j] = -dx[(dim1-2)+dim1*j];
00404   }
00405   
00406   for (i = 0; i < dim1; i++) {
00407     xout[i] += dy[i];
00408     for (j = 0; j < dim2-2; j++) {
00409       xout[i+dim1*(j+1)] += dy[i+dim1*(j+1)]-dy[i+dim1*j];
00410     }
00411     xout[i+dim1*(dim2-1)] -= dy[i+dim1*(dim2-2)];
00412   }
00413   
00414 }
00415 
00423 void sopt_utility_divergencer(double *xout, double *dx, 
00424                      double *dy, int dim1, int dim2){
00425   
00426   int i, j;
00427   
00428   for (j = 0; j < dim2; j++) {
00429     xout[dim1*j] = dx[dim1*j];
00430     for (i = 0; i < dim1-2; i++) {
00431       xout[(i+1)+dim1*j] = dx[(i+1)+dim1*j]-dx[i+dim1*j];
00432     }
00433     xout[(dim1-1)+dim1*j] = -dx[(dim1-2)+dim1*j];
00434   }
00435   
00436   for (i = 0; i < dim1; i++) {
00437     xout[i] += dy[i];
00438     for (j = 0; j < dim2-2; j++) {
00439       xout[i+dim1*(j+1)] += dy[i+dim1*(j+1)]-dy[i+dim1*j];
00440     }
00441     xout[i+dim1*(dim2-1)] -= dy[i+dim1*(dim2-2)];
00442   }
00443   
00444 }
00445 
00452 void sopt_utility_projposc(complex double *xout, complex double *xin, int dim){
00453   
00454   int i;
00455   double temp;
00456   
00457   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00458     temp = creal(xin[i]);
00459     if (temp < 0.0)
00460       xout[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00461     else 
00462       xout[i] = temp + 0.0*I;
00463   }
00464   
00465 }
00466 
00473 void sopt_utility_projposr(double *xout, double *xin, int dim){
00474   
00475   int i;
00476   
00477   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00478     if (xin[i] < 0.0)
00479       xout[i] = 0.0;
00480     else 
00481       xout[i] = xin[i];
00482   }
00483   
00484 }
00485 
00492 void sopt_utility_projreal(complex double *xout, complex double *xin, int dim){
00493   
00494   int i;
00495   
00496   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00497     xout[i] = (complex double)creal(xin[i]);
00498   }
00499   
00500 }
00501 
00509 complex double sopt_utility_dotpc(complex double *xin, complex double *yin, int dim){
00510   
00511   complex double p = 0.0 +I*0.0;
00512   int i;
00513   
00514   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00515     p += conj(xin[i])*yin[i];
00516   }
00517 
00518   return p;
00519   
00520 }
00521 
00529 double sopt_utility_dotpr(double *xin, double *yin, int dim){
00530   
00531   double p = 0.0;
00532   int i;
00533   
00534   for (i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00535     p += xin[i]*yin[i];
00536   }
00537 
00538   return p;
00539   
00540 }
00541 
00562 double sopt_utility_btrackc(complex double *v,
00563                           complex double *r, 
00564                           complex double *w, 
00565                           complex double *dummy,
00566                           complex double *xaux,  
00567                           complex double *xout, 
00568                           complex double *xin, 
00569                           void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00570                           void **A_data,
00571                           void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00572                           void **At_data,
00573                           int nx, 
00574                           int ny,
00575                           double nu,
00576                           double epsilon){
00577   
00578   complex double alpha = 0.0 +I*0.0;
00579   double kappa=nu, temp=0.0;
00580   double fval=0.0, qval=0.0, faval=0.0;
00581   int iter = 1;
00582   int verbose = 0;
00583 
00584 
00585   //Computing F and Q.
00586   //Q = 0.5*||Atu||_2^2 - <u,Axin> + <u-v,Axout> + 0.5*kappa*||v-u||_2^2
00587   //
00588   //F = 0.5*||Atv||_2^2 - <v,Axin>
00589 
00590   //faval stores the unchanged portion of Q
00591 
00592   A((void*)dummy, (void*)xout, A_data);
00593   alpha = sopt_utility_dotpc(w,dummy,ny);
00594   faval = creal(alpha);
00595   alpha = sopt_utility_dotpc(v,dummy,ny);
00596   qval = -creal(alpha);
00597 
00598   A((void*)dummy, (void*)xin, A_data);
00599   alpha = sopt_utility_dotpc(w,dummy,ny);
00600   faval -= creal(alpha);
00601   At((void*)xaux, (void*)w, At_data);
00602   temp = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)xaux, 1);
00603   temp = 0.5*temp*temp;
00604   faval += temp;
00605 
00606   
00607   alpha = sopt_utility_dotpc(v,dummy,ny); 
00608   fval = -creal(alpha);
00609   At((void*)xaux, (void*)v, At_data);
00610   temp = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)xaux, 1);
00611   temp = 0.5*temp*temp;
00612   fval += temp;
00613   
00614   cblas_zcopy(ny, (void*)v, 1, (void*)dummy, 1);
00615   alpha = -1.0 +0.0*I;
00616   cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, (void*)w, 1, (void*)dummy, 1);
00617   temp = cblas_dznrm2(ny, (void*)dummy, 1);
00618   temp = kappa*0.5*temp*temp;
00619   qval += faval + temp;
00620 
00621   
00622 
00623   while ((fval > 1.0*qval)&&(iter < 50)){
00624     kappa = 2*kappa;
00625     //dummy = r;
00626     cblas_zcopy(ny, (void*)r, 1, (void*)dummy, 1);
00627     //Rescaling
00628     //dummy = kappa*w + dummy
00629     alpha = kappa + 0.0*I;
00630     cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, (void*)w, 1, (void*)dummy, 1);
00631 
00632     //Projection onto the l2 ball
00633     temp = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)dummy, 1);
00634     temp = min(1.0,epsilon/temp);
00635 
00636     //v = 1/kappa*(1.0 - norm_res)*dummy
00637     cblas_zcopy(ny, (void*)dummy, 1, (void*)v, 1);
00638     cblas_zdscal(ny, (1.0 - temp)/kappa, (void*)v,1);
00639 
00640     //Evaluation of F and Q
00641     A((void*)dummy, (void*)xout, A_data);
00642     alpha = sopt_utility_dotpc(v,dummy,ny);
00643     qval = faval - creal(alpha);
00644     cblas_zcopy(ny, (void*)v, 1, (void*)dummy, 1);
00645     alpha = -1.0 +0.0*I;
00646     cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, (void*)w, 1, (void*)dummy, 1);
00647     temp = cblas_dznrm2(ny, (void*)dummy, 1);
00648     temp = kappa*0.5*temp*temp;
00649     qval += temp;
00650 
00651     A((void*)dummy, (void*)xin, A_data);
00652     alpha = sopt_utility_dotpc(v,dummy,ny); 
00653     fval = -creal(alpha);
00654     At((void*)xaux, (void*)v, At_data);
00655     temp = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)xaux, 1);
00656     temp = 0.5*temp*temp;
00657     fval += temp;
00658 
00659     iter++;
00660     //Step back
00661     //kappa = 2*kappa;
00662 
00663   }
00664   if (verbose > 0){
00665             printf("Number of iterations = %i, L = %e \n ", iter-1, kappa);
00666             printf("F = %e, Q = %e \n ", fval, qval);
00667   }
00668 
00669   
00670 
00671   return kappa;
00672   
00673 }
00674 
00695 double sopt_utility_btrackr(double *v,
00696                           double *r, 
00697                           double *w, 
00698                           double *dummy,
00699                           double *xaux,  
00700                           double *xout, 
00701                           double *xin, 
00702                           void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00703                           void **A_data,
00704                           void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00705                           void **At_data,
00706                           int nx, 
00707                           int ny,
00708                           double nu,
00709                           double epsilon){
00710   
00711   double kappa=nu, temp=0.0;
00712   double fval=0.0, qval=0.0, faval=0.0;
00713   int iter = 1;
00714 
00715 
00716   //Computing F and Q.
00717   //Q = 0.5*||Atu||_2^2 - <u,Axin> + <u-v,Axout> + 0.5*kappa*||v-u||_2^2
00718   //
00719   //F = 0.5*||Atv||_2^2 - <v,Axin>
00720 
00721   //faval stores the unchanged portion of Q
00722 
00723   A(dummy, xout, A_data);
00724   temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(w,dummy,ny);
00725   faval = temp;
00726   temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(v,dummy,ny);
00727   qval = -temp;
00728 
00729   A(dummy, xin, A_data);
00730   temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(w,dummy,ny);
00731   faval -= temp;
00732   At(xaux, w, At_data);
00733   temp = cblas_dnrm2(nx, xaux, 1);
00734   temp = 0.5*temp*temp;
00735   faval += temp;
00736 
00737   
00738   temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(v,dummy,ny); 
00739   fval = -temp;
00740   At(xaux, v, At_data);
00741   temp = cblas_dnrm2(nx, xaux, 1);
00742   temp = 0.5*temp*temp;
00743   fval += temp;
00744   
00745   cblas_dcopy(ny, v, 1, dummy, 1);
00746   cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, w, 1, dummy, 1);
00747   temp = cblas_dnrm2(ny, dummy, 1);
00748   temp = kappa*0.5*temp*temp;
00749   qval += faval + temp;
00750 
00751   while ((fval > qval)&&(iter < 50)){
00752     //Step back
00753     kappa = 2*kappa;
00754     //dummy = r;
00755     cblas_dcopy(ny, r, 1, dummy, 1);
00756     //Rescaling
00757     //dummy = kappa*w + dummy
00758     cblas_daxpy(ny, kappa, w, 1, dummy, 1);
00759 
00760     //Projection onto the l2 ball
00761     temp = cblas_dnrm2(ny, dummy, 1);
00762     temp = min(1.0,epsilon/temp);
00763 
00764     //v = 1/kappa*(1.0 - norm_res)*dummy
00765     cblas_dcopy(ny, dummy, 1, v, 1);
00766     cblas_dscal(ny, (1.0 - temp)/kappa, v,1);
00767 
00768     //Evaluation of F and Q
00769     A(dummy, xout, A_data);
00770     temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(v,dummy,ny);
00771     qval = faval - temp;
00772     cblas_dcopy(ny, v, 1, dummy, 1);
00773     cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, w, 1, dummy, 1);
00774     temp = cblas_dnrm2(ny, dummy, 1);
00775     temp = kappa*0.5*temp*temp;
00776     qval += temp;
00777 
00778     A(dummy, xin, A_data);
00779     temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(v,dummy,ny); 
00780     fval = -temp;
00781     At(xaux, v, At_data);
00782     temp = cblas_dnrm2(nx, xaux, 1);
00783     temp = 0.5*temp*temp;
00784     fval += temp;
00785 
00786     iter++;
00787 
00788   }
00789 
00790   return kappa;
00791   
00792 }
00793 
00818 void sopt_utility_cgsolc(complex double *xout,
00819                             complex double *xin, 
00820                             complex double *v,
00821                             complex double *r,
00822                             complex double *p,
00823                             complex double *ap,
00824                             void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00825                             void **A_data,
00826                             void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00827                             void **At_data,
00828                             int nx, 
00829                             int ny,
00830                             double tol,
00831                             int nit,
00832                             int verbose){
00833   int i;
00834   double temp, rsold, rsnew, alpha, nb, relres;
00835   complex double beta;
00836   
00837   //Check if the input vector is the 
00838   //zero vector
00839   temp = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)xin, 1);
00840   temp = temp*temp;
00841   nb = temp;
00842   
00843   if (temp > 0){
00844     //r=xin-P(xin)
00845     //Assumes xout is near xin as a first guess
00846     //xout = P(xin) = AtA(xin)+2xin
00847     A(v, xin, A_data);
00848     At(xout, v, At_data);
00849     beta = 2.0 + 0.0*I;
00850     cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&beta, (void*)xin, 1, (void*)xout, 1);
00851     //r=xin
00852     cblas_zcopy(nx, (void*)xin, 1, (void*)r, 1);
00853     //r=r-xout
00854     beta = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00855     cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&beta, (void*)xout, 1, (void*)r, 1);
00856     //p=r
00857     cblas_zcopy(nx, (void*)r, 1, (void*)p, 1);
00858     rsold = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)r, 1);
00859     rsold = rsold*rsold;
00860     //xout=xin
00861     cblas_zcopy(nx, (void*)xin, 1, (void*)xout, 1);
00862     
00863     //Main loop
00864     for (i=1; i <= nit; i++){
00865       //ap=AtA(p)+2p
00866       A(v, p, A_data);
00867       At(ap, v, At_data);
00868       beta = 2.0 + 0.0*I;
00869       cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&beta, (void*)p, 1, (void*)ap, 1);
00870       //alpha=rsold/(p'*ap)
00871       temp = creal(sopt_utility_dotpc(p, ap, nx));
00872       alpha = rsold/temp;
00873       //xout=xout+alpha*p
00874       beta = alpha + 0.0*I;
00875       cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&beta, (void*)p, 1, (void*)xout, 1);
00876       //r=r-alpha*ap
00877       beta = -alpha + 0.0*I;
00878       cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&beta, (void*)ap, 1, (void*)r, 1);
00879       rsnew = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)r, 1);
00880       rsnew = rsnew*rsnew;
00881       relres = rsnew/nb;
00882       if (relres < tol){
00883         break;
00884       }
00885       //p=r+temp*p
00886       temp = rsnew/rsold;
00887       //cblas_zcopy(nx, (void*)r, 1, (void*)p, 1);
00888       cblas_zdscal(nx, temp, (void*)p, 1);
00889       beta = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00890       cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&beta, (void*)r, 1, (void*)p, 1);
00891       rsold = rsnew;
00892       //Log
00893       if (verbose > 2){
00894         printf("Iter %i: tol = %e, res = %e, rel res = %e\n ", i, tol, rsnew, relres);
00895       }
00896     }
00897 
00898   }
00899   else{
00900     //If temp = 0 then xout=xin
00901     cblas_zcopy(nx, (void*)xin, 1, (void*)xout, 1);
00902     i = 0;
00903     relres = 1.0;
00904     rsnew = 0.0;
00905 
00906   }
00907 
00908   //Log
00909   if (verbose > 1){
00910     printf("Conjugate gradient: res = %e, rel res = %e, num. iter = %i\n ", rsnew, relres, i);
00911   }
00912 
00913 
00914 }
00915 
00940 void sopt_utility_cgsolr(double *xout,
00941                             double *xin, 
00942                             double *v,
00943                             double *r,
00944                             double *p,
00945                             double *ap,
00946                             void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00947                             void **A_data,
00948                             void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00949                             void **At_data,
00950                             int nx, 
00951                             int ny,
00952                             double tol,
00953                             int nit,
00954                             int verbose){
00955   int i;
00956   double temp, rsold, rsnew, alpha, nb, relres;
00957   
00958   //Check if the input vector is the 
00959   //zero vector
00960   temp = cblas_dnrm2(nx, xin, 1);
00961   temp = temp*temp;
00962   nb = temp;
00963   
00964   if (temp > 0){
00965     //r=xin-P(xin)
00966     //Assumes xout is near xin as a first guess
00967     //xout = P(xin) = AtA(xin)+2xin
00968     A(v, xin, A_data);
00969     At(xout, v, At_data);
00970     cblas_daxpy(nx, 2.0, xin, 1, xout, 1);
00971     //r=xin
00972     cblas_dcopy(nx, xin, 1, r, 1);
00973     //r=r-xout
00974     cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, xout, 1, r, 1);
00975     //p=r
00976     cblas_dcopy(nx, r, 1, p, 1);
00977     rsold = cblas_dnrm2(nx, r, 1);
00978     rsold = rsold*rsold;
00979     //xout=xin
00980     cblas_dcopy(nx, xin, 1, xout, 1);
00981     
00982     //Main loop
00983     for (i=1; i <= nit; i++){
00984       //ap=AtA(p)+2p
00985       A(v, p, A_data);
00986       At(ap, v, At_data);
00987       cblas_daxpy(nx, 2.0, p, 1, ap, 1);
00988       //alpha=rsold/(p'*ap)
00989       temp = sopt_utility_dotpr(p, ap, nx);
00990       alpha = rsold/temp;
00991       //xout=xout+alpha*p
00992       cblas_daxpy(nx, alpha, p, 1, xout, 1);
00993       //r=r-alpha*ap
00994       cblas_daxpy(nx, -alpha, ap, 1, r, 1);
00995       rsnew = cblas_dnrm2(nx, r, 1);
00996       rsnew = rsnew*rsnew;
00997       relres = rsnew/nb;
00998       if (relres < tol){
00999         break;
01000       }
01001       //p=r+temp*p
01002       temp = rsnew/rsold;
01003       cblas_dscal(nx, temp, p,1);
01004       cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, r, 1, p, 1);
01005       rsold = rsnew;
01006       //Log
01007       if (verbose > 2){
01008         printf("Iter %i: tol = %e, res = %e, rel res = %e\n ", i, tol, rsnew, relres);
01009       }
01010     }
01011 
01012   }
01013   else{
01014     //If temp = 0 then xout=xin
01015     cblas_dcopy(nx, xin, 1, xout, 1);
01016     i = 0;
01017     relres = 1.0;
01018     rsnew = 0.0;
01019 
01020   }
01021 
01022   //Log
01023   if (verbose > 1){
01024     printf("Conjugate gradient: res = %e, rel res = %e, num. iter = %i\n ", rsnew, relres, i);
01025   }
01026 
01027 }
